title: Jun ga Kureta Inochi
synopsis: Kenichi is a 1st year middle school student who can not endure repeated bullying. He jump out of the window on the third floor of the school to try to commit suicide. However, he miraculously regained his life. At the hospital where he was brought in, Kenichi will be in the same room as Jun Hayashi, an older kid who is suffering from heart disease and can only move in a wheelchair.
